Plot: Hatch Harrison had a traffic accident with his car. At first the doctors said he was dead but then they succeeded to bring him back to life after two hours. But Hatch starts to have strange...
Title: Hideaway
Writer: Dean R. Koontz (novel), Andrew Kevin Walker (screenplay), Neal Jimenez (screenplay)
